A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie fell short\, it wasted incredibly pivotal story lines for main characters and did not deliver on what TFA set up for it. It was almost cringe infused in some parts where you knew Disney were slowly sinking into the story with its bad slapstick humor and the entire Star Wars universe was not utilized like its predecessors. Rian really screwed this one up and its heart breaking for old school fans :(
